mapper.select: select b_no "b_no" , subject "subject" , writer "writer" , reg_date "reg_date" , readcount "readcount" , content "content" , pwd "pwd" , email "email" , group_no "group_no" , print_no "print_no" , print_level "print_level" from board where b_no=#{b_no}
